name: Dungeon of Rooks
description:
Developers

Design:

Nathan Dunton

Lydia Hodges

Freya Smith

Artists

Samantha Jones

Beth Parlett

Programmers

Elodie Lillywhite

Dungeon of Rooks is an 3D Top Down Dungeon Crawler where you play as an Pawn Warrior needing to escape the dungeon! In order to do so, they must collect all trophies in a specific order, defeat the Queen, and claim the JamFest Jam!

This game was developed for the University of Northampton Game Jam of 2022.
